title: Rainbow Bird Rendezvous
typeOfFood: Vegan, Japanese, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: July 2013 reported food is all vegan. Selection changes daily and seasonally and always includes vegan versions of Japanese fare like karaage, hamburg, tonkatsu, potato croquette, curry rice, and salad. Has vegan desserts, at least one raw dessert, and smoothies. Last order is one hour before closing.
